CAMERA._comment_camera: USB_PORT: Camera device index or video file path. Set width/height to null for default

DETECTION._comment_detection: INTERVAL: seconds between checks. CONFIDENCE: 0.1-0.9, lower = more sensitive

STORAGE._comment_storage: Files older than RETENTION_HOURS will be deleted. When disk space < THRESHOLD_GB, use AGGRESSIVE_CLEANUP_HOURS

NOTIFICATIONS._comment_notifications: RATE_LIMIT: max notifications per minute. GIF_FPS: recording quality, NOTIFICATION_GIF_FPS: telegram quality

SYSTEM._comment_system: CHECK_INTERVAL: system maintenance interval. LOG_LEVEL: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
